name: Kafka Replicator Sink
shortDescription: Consume data from a Quix topic and produce it to an external Kafka cluster

Variables.Name: input
Variables.Description: Name of the input topic to listen to.

Variables.Name: SINK_AUTO_CREATE_TOPIC
Variables.Description: Path to the SSL CA certificate file for secure connections. If not provided, system default CA certificates will be used

Variables.Name: SINK_OUTPUT_TOPIC
Variables.Description: The target Kafka topic name to produce to on the external Kafka cluster

Variables.Name: SINK_BOOTSTRAP_SERVERS
Variables.Description: The external Kafka broker address (e.g., localhost:9092 or broker.example.com:9092)

Variables.Name: SINK_KEY_SERIALIZER
Variables.Description: Serializer to use for the message key. Options: json, bytes, string, double, integer

Variables.Name: SINK_VALUE_SERIALIZER
Variables.Description: Serializer to use for the message value. Options: json, bytes, string, double, integer

Variables.Name: SINK_SECURITY_PROTOCOL
Variables.Description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. Options: PLAINTEXT, SSL, SASL_PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL

Variables.Name: SINK_SASL_MECHANISM
Variables.Description: SASL mechanism for authentication. Options: PLAIN, SCRAM-SHA-256, SCRAM-SHA-512, GSSAPI, OAUTHBEARER, AWS_MSK_IAM

Variables.Name: SINK_SASL_USERNAME
Variables.Description: SASL username for external Kafka authentication

Variables.Name: SINK_SASL_PASSWORD
Variables.Description: SASL password for external Kafka authentication

Variables.Name: SINK_SSL_CA_LOCATION
Variables.Description: Path to the SSL CA certificate file for secure connections. If not provided, system default CA certificates will be used
